description: A tmnxDiamPolicyPeerStateChange notification is generated when the
state of a DIAMETER policy peer changes.
The value of tmnxDiamPeerPrimarySecondary indicates whether the
DIAMETER peer figures as primary or secondary peer in its policy.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamPeerPrimarySecondary

description: The value of tmnxDiamPeerConnectionSuspended indicates whether the peer's
DIAMETER connection that is in I-Open state has been temporarily put on
suspension.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamPeerConnectionSuspended

description: The value of tmnxDiamPeerCooldownSeqActive indicates whether the
DIAMETER Cooldown Sequence is currently running.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamPeerCooldownSeqActive

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription specifies the diameter
application provided description of the failure for this trap.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription

description: The tmnxDiamAppMessageDropped notification indicates that
the DIAMETER protocol has dropped a message due to some reason.

Summary.eval: ($v3 ne '') ? '$v3' : 'Diameter protocol dropped a message due to some reason'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppMessageDropped TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppPlcyName s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppPeerName s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppPlcyName specifies the name of the DIAMETER
policy.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppPlcyName

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppPeerName specifies the name of the
peer within a DIAMETER policy.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppPeerName

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription specifies the diameter
application provided description of the failure for this trap.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription

description: The tmnxDiamAppSessionFailure notification indicates that
the DIAMETER protocol has a session failure.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSessionFailure TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSessionId s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSubscrId s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSapId s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSLAProfName s EXAMPLE TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppSessionId specifies the diameter session id
for this trap.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSessionId

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppSubscrId specifies the subscriber
identification for this trap.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSubscrId

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppSapId specifies the SAP
identification for this trap.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSapId

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppSLAProfName specifies the SLA profile name
for this trap.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppSLAProfName

description: The value of tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription specifies the diameter
application provided description of the failure for this trap.
variables.name: TIMETRA-DIAMETER-MIB::tmnxDiamAppTrapDescription
